page.title: 17ABERDEEN NEWS STORIES cont.
page.content: {SCHOOL READY FOR THE OFF.}Six pupils from Cordyce School are sailing to Rhu on the Clyde.The children are aged from 13_15.Their voyage is 200 miles long.The event is due to finish at Troon. {TWO HURT IN INDUSTRIAL ACCIDENTS.}Two men were injured in separate indust- rial accidents.The first occured in Dyce when a man fell from a ladder.The second man was hit by steel pipes which fell from a lorry. {LIZZIE'S AWA' HAME.}The Queen got ready to board the plane at Aberdeen yesterday after spending the weekend at Balmoral.The Duke of Edinburgh was at the controls as the plane left. {BARRATT DOING WELL.}Barratt are doing well with their new site.It is at Danestone,Aberdeen.They bought 70% of the Danestone estate and is one of the best buys they have made.
